offer.name: Canon EOS R
offer.description: CANON EOS R, 30 Mpx. The EOS R is Canon's first full-frame mirrorless camera. It features a 30.3MP CMOS sensor with Dual Pixel AF and an ISO range of 100-40000 (expandable to 50-102400). The EOS R can record both 14-bit (CRW) and compressed (C-RAW) formats. It can shoot continuously at 8 fps in single AF and 5 fps with continuous AF

offer.name: HP notebook 4530S
offer.description: HP 4530S, 4Gb Ram, 320Gb HDD. Outfitted with a 2.3-GHz Intel Core i5-2410M processor and 4GB of RAM, the HP ProBook 4530s offers solid performance. Equipped with a large 500GB hard drive spinning at a quick 7,200 rpm, the ProBook 4530s managed to fire up Windows 7 Professional in 58 seconds, 8 seconds faster than the average 15-inch notebook

offer.name: Iphone 3
offer.description: TFT capacitive touchscreen, 3.5 inches, 16M colors, 2 Mpx

offer.name: Samsung C27R500
offer.description: Samsung C27R500 27'. FHD Curved Monitor with 1800R curvature and 3-sided bezel-less screen.

offer.name: Audio-Tech AT-LP120
offer.description: The best starter turntable with all the features you'll ever need. This professional stereo turntable features a high-torque direct-drive motor for quick start-ups and a USB output that connects directly to your computer. Other features include: forward and reverse play capability; cast aluminum platter with slip mat and a start/stop button; three speeds 33/45/78; selectable high-accuracy quartz-controlled pitch lock and pitch change slider control with +/-10% or +/-20% adjustment ranges; and removable hinged dust cover. Mac and PC compatible Audacity software digitizes your LPs Direct drive high-torque motor. Stroboscopic platter speed indicator

offer.name: Behringer Vmx200
offer.description: Professional 2-channel ultra-low noise DJ mixer with state-of-the-art phono preamps. Super-smooth, long-life ULTRAGLIDE faders (up to 500,000 cycles). 3-band kill EQ (-32 dB) and precise level meters with peak hold function

offer.name: Kington 16GB Flash
offer.description: 16 GB Flash Drive. Convenient - small, capless and pocket-sized for easy transportability. Durable - metal casing with sturdy ring. USB Specification: USB 2.0,Guaranteed - five-year warranty

offer.name: Pioneer DDJ-WEGO-K
offer.description: Ultra-compact and affordable DJ controller. Plug & Play with bundled Virtual DJ LE software. Pulse Control Provides Visual Prompts via Various Types of Illuminations Directly on the Unit. Multi-colored LED for customization of lights to match the user's style
